Cherrycake\Modules\DatabaseProvider

DatabaseProvider

Base class for database provider implementations. Intended to be overloaded by a higher level database system implementation class.
Database providers are only connected when required (when the first request is received)

    Synopsis

    • deleteByUniqueField() — Deletes a single row in the database identified by the given $idFieldName and $idFieldValue. More complex deletes should be done by the app by calling other methods on this class like prepareAndExecute

    • requireConnection() — requireConnection
    • updateByUniqueField() — Updates a single row in the database identified by the given $idFieldName and $idFieldValue with the given $fields data. More complex updates should be done by the app by calling other methods on this class like prepareAndExecute
